main event: An observer at Kadena Air Base in Okinawa saw a round white object splitting into parts, which exhibited rapid zig-zag movement over a span of 3-4 seconds.
interesting points: The object split into approximately 30 segments during its rapid movement,The trajectory of the object changed abruptly, leading to speculation it may have been an optical illusion or distortion,The observation lasted for about 1-2 seconds,The observer was a highly qualified individual capable of differentiating between meteor activity and unusual sightings,The report suggested that it might have been a bolide (meteor).
sighted object: round white object splitting into parts
witness description: observer is extremely well qualified to differentiate meteors and meteorite activity from unusual sightings
